abilityEffect.en: As long as Light Dragonite is your Active Pok√©mon, each Special Energy card provides [C] Energy instead of its usual type and its other effects stop working. This power stops working while Light Dragonite is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

effect.en: Prevent all effects of attacks, other than damage, done to Light Dragonite during your opponent's next turn.
